raw_comment:
I notice that the US is decreasing.

I wonder how we can make a change.

This shows us the usage of fossil fuel in the US.

Catchy Headline
The World is Changing Fast
ace_sentences: I notice that the US is decreasing.
I wonder how we can make a change.
This shows the usage of fossil fuel in the US.
The headline is: The World is Changing Fast.
